bibl.title: An Attitude of Anti-feminism in Greco-Roman School Texts.
bibl.note: Points out, through papyrological evidence, that the misogyny, which began in Greek literature as early as the time of Hesiod, continued in the school texts and analyses the "complex woman's nature".
